Interface INodeLocator

All Known Implementing Classes:
CommonNodeLocator, RemoteNodeLocator
public interface INodeLocator

locates an INode

Author:
amitport

Method Summary
 INode locate(java.lang.String sourceService, java.lang.String sourceClient, NodeLocation location)
          locates the INode
 

Method Detail

locate

INode locate(java.lang.String sourceService,
             java.lang.String sourceClient,
             NodeLocation location)
locates the INode

Parameters:
sourceService - the service to which the requesting client belongs to
sourceClient - the client that wants to locate some node
location - the location of the node that should be located
Returns:
the node (which may be local or a proxy of a remote node)
